Jakarta Open Chess 2019, Kans Novendra Resmikan Gelar Grand Master
07 Nov 2019, 20:43 by Adi Wiyono


Jakarta Open Chess 2019, Kans Novendra Resmikan Gelar Grand Master

KBRN, Jakarta : Persatuan Catur Seluruh Indonesia DKI Jakarta (Percaja) akan menggelar Tournamen International Jakarta Open 2019 yang berlangsung di Hotel Grand Kemang Jakarta tanggal 12-16 November mendatang mempertandingkan partai Dwi Tarung International dan katagori Open (Terbuka).
Ketua Percaja Ricardo SE menyebutkan, sampai saat sudah terdaftar 150 pecatur yang siap berpatisipasi. "Sedangkan kuota kami buka hingga 300-350 peserta. Kami tutup sampai tanggal 11 November. Kalau pecatur memang biasa daftarnya di hari akhir," ujar Ricardo saat memberikan keterangan kemarin kepada Media Kamis (7/11/2019).
Pada ajang tersebut, pihak panitia membatasi bagi peserta yang ingin tampil dengan syarat elo rating maksimal 2.200.
"Kami sengaja buat batasan elo rating bagi pecatur peserta Jakarta Open supaya ivent lebih berkelas dan yang bermain memiliki FIDE ID sehingga penampilan mereka ada pointnya,‚Äù tambah Ricardo yang juga mantan Manajer Tim Catur SEA Games Indonesia.
Pada kesempatan sama Kabid Binpres PB Percasi Kristianus Liem mengapresiasi Tournament Jakarta Open, terlebih, salah satu partai utama dalam event ini adalah dwi tarung antara pecatur andalan DKI Jakarta yang juga anggota Tim Nasional SEA Games MI Novendra Priasmoro akan menghadapi Grand Master asal Vietnam, Nguyen Anh Dung.
Pemenang dalam laga tersebut bakal mendapat USD 2.000. Sedangkan, USD 1.000 bagi yang kalah. Tak hanya itu, peluang Novendra untuk bisa meraih gelar GM terbuka lebar. Untuk saat ini, dia sudah memiliki nilai elo rating 2.495.
Sedangkan, untuk meraih GM minimal harus mendapat 2.500. Artinya, Novendra hanya membutuhkan lima poin lagi untuk bisa mendapat gelar GM. Dalam laga nanti, keduanya akan memainkan enam babak catur klasik.
"Pecatur Indonesia terakhir kali mendapat gelar GM adalah Susanto Megaranto pada tahun 2004. Jadi artinya sudah lama sekali kami tidak mencetak GM," terang Kristianus Liem.
Terkait lawan yang dihadapi, Kristian menyebut harusnya Novendra bisa menang. Sebab, prestasi dari lawannya Anh Dung sudah agak menurun dan bukan lagi menjadi pecatur utama. Bahkan, tidak ikut dalam Sea Games 2019 Filipina.
Rating lawan pun ada di bawah Novendra dengan 2.471. Setiap pertandingan, jika Novendra menang bisa mendapat tambahan 4,7 poin. "Jadi kalau bisa dua menang dan selebihnya imbang bisa aman lah untuk mendapat gelar GM dan ini jadi sejarah baru," tambah Kristianus.
Sepanjang perjalanannya ini, Novendra mendapat dukungan dari United Tractors. Dia masuk program sejak 2017. Novendra mulanya diharapkan bisa mendapat gelar GM maksimal pada 2020.
MIW Upi Darmayana Tamin salah seorang pecatur senior DKI Jakarta berterima kasih adanya dukungan dari pihak swasta bagi pecatur. Dia berharap ke depannya dukungan bisa lebih merata.
"Novendra ini oleh Percaja diproyeksikan karena elo ratingnya mendekati 2500. Satu lagi adalah MI Sean Winshand Cuhendi yang memiliki elo rating cukup tinggi," kata Upi.

Jakarta Open Chess 2019, Kans Novendra Inaugurates Grand Master Title
Nov 7 2019, 20:43 by Adi Wiyono


Jakarta Open Chess 2019, Kans Novendra Inaugurates Grand Master Title

KBRN, Jakarta: The Indonesian Chess Association of DKI Jakarta (Percaja) will hold the 2019 Jakarta Open International Tournament which will take place at the Grand Kemang Hotel in Jakarta on 12-16 November to bring the Dwi Tarung International party and the Open category open.
Percaja Chairman Ricardo SE said that up to now 150 registered chess players were ready to participate. "While our quota is open up to 300-350 participants. We are closed until November 11. If chess players are used to the list at the end of the day," Ricardo said when giving a statement yesterday to the Media on Thursday (11/07/2019).
At the event, the committee limits the participants who want to appear with the condition that you have a maximum rating of 2,200.
"We deliberately set a limit for your rating for Jakarta Open chess players so that the class is more classy and those who play have FIDE ID so that their performance has a point," added Ricardo who is also a former SEA Games Indonesia Chess Team Manager.
On the same occasion, Head of PB Binpres Perc Percasi Kristianus Liem appreciated the Jakarta Open Tournament, moreover, one of the main parties in this event was a dual battle between the Jakarta's mainstay chess players who were also members of the SEA Games MI National Team Novendra Priasmoro will face the Vietnamese Grand Master, Nguyen Anh Dung
The winner in the match will get USD 2,000. Meanwhile, USD 1,000 for the losers. Not only that, Novendra's opportunity to win the GM title is wide open. For now, he already has an elo rating of 2,495.
Meanwhile, to reach GM, a minimum must be 2,500. That is, Novendra only needs five more points to be able to get the GM title. In the match, both of them will play six classic chess stages.
"The last time Indonesian chess player got the title GM was Susanto Megaranto in 2004. So that means we haven't printed GM for a long time," explained Kristianus Liem.
Related opponents faced, Kristian said Novendra should be able to win. Therefore, the achievements of his opponent Anh Dung has declined somewhat and is no longer the main chess player. In fact, did not participate in the 2019 Philippines Sea Games.
The opponent's rating is below Novendra with 2,471. Every match, if Novendra wins, he can get an additional 4.7 points. "So if you can win two and the remaining draw you can be safe to get the GM title and this will be a new history," added Kristianus.
Throughout this journey, Novendra received support from United Tractors. He entered the program since 2017. Novendra was initially expected to get a maximum GM degree in 2020.
MIW Upi Darmayana Tamin, one of Jakarta's senior chess players, is grateful for the support of the private sector for chess players. He hopes that in the future support can be more evenly distributed.
"Novendra is projected by Percaja because your rating is close to 2500. Another one is MI Sean Winshand Cuhendi who has a fairly high rating of you," Upi said.
